data.message: I have also been trying to get my point across in reference to my Facebook with not having my original friends and my family connections.  Why are you doing this?  My family photos and hearing from my good and long time friends I really miss keeping in touch with them. When will I get all this back?  Please respond to my past Facebook.

replies.message: Hi Carolyn. If something's not working with your Facebook, you can report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2gT4DL1. -Stephanie
